title: Sauce Boat, 20th century
markings: Stamped on base in dark green: sailing ship over HOPEWELL over OHHU overFZU; in glit: "warranted 18 carat gold"
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Maxime Hermanos
description: octagonal-sided gravy boat; cream colored ground with gilded details and poorly printed pattern in black and red around shoulder.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sauce Boat, 20th century.
20th century. bone china. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Maxime Hermanos. 1967-84-9.
